title: Ultimate Detox and Energy Kit
description: Looking for a very effective, yet gentle cleanse that is easy on your stomach and digestive system? Buy Skinny Jane Detox Energy Kit
cleaned_text: Product Overview Ultimate Detox and Energy Kit Looking for a very effective, yet gentle cleanse that is easy on your stomach and digestive system? This kit is very popular with our customers because of its effectiveness and gentle formula. Your Ultimate Detox and Energy Kit includes four great Skinny Jane products: 1. T.K.O. Weight Loss Tea: - a great tasting weight loss/detox tea designed to cleanse and energize your body and mind. It contains a special blend of 8 all natural ingredients to help you cleanse your body and feel lighter. Nutrition Info: 0 calories per serving Sugar Free Very low caffeine content Special blend of 8 all natural ingredients Benefits: Suppresses appetite Boosts metabolism Speeds weight loss Tastes great! 1 Tin contains 20 sachets Suggested use: Drink 2-3 cups daily, preferably before each meal and in the middle of the afternoon, eat around 1200 calories a day, and do not eat after 7 P.M. for best results. 2. Skinny Cleanse: - a safe, all natural supplement that helps cleanse your body and jump-start your weight loss. Benefits: 5 cutting edge, natural ingredients Helps reduce food cravings Increases energy Boosts metabolism Cleanses toxins from the body 30 capsules per bottle/ 15 day formula Very safe and gentle cleanse kit Suggested use: Take 2 capsules with 8 oz. of water 20-30 min before bed. If you experience too strong of a cleanse, adjust to one capsule at night. Results vary. 3. Skinny Burn: - a unique supplement formulated to help decrease your hunger, burn body fat more efficiently and give you energy. Benefits: 9 unique, natural ingredients Speeds metabolism Burns body fat Reduces cravings Gives you energy without jitters 60 capsules per bottle 4. Core Care 180: a premium, high quality probiotic. Helps With: Bloating Dieting Improving Digestion Yeast Infections Improving Energy Boosts Mood and Well-Being 60 capsules per bottle Order your Ultimate Detox and Energy Kit today!
